Author: jdoebe
Text: I tried. I even allowed myself tasty food during diet when i wanted to prevent binges. It didn’t help. I’m hopeless. But thank you for attempt to help, I appreciate it.

Author: paperklipp
Text: Try scheduling a binge in advance. For example, tell yourself you’re eating [insert craving here] for the whole weekend at the end of this month. Candy, pizza, ice cream, whatever your heart desires. But you can’t have it until then. See if that helps with making you feel more in control.
